parameters.query:
UPDATE public.usr_chat
SET anotacoes_usr = $2::text,
    atualizado_em = NOW()
WHERE id = $1::uuid
  AND usuario_id = $3::uuid
  AND $4::text = 'conversa'
RETURNING id, anotacoes_usr, atualizado_em;

UPDATE public.quests_recorrencias
SET anotacoes_quest = $2::text,
    atualizado_em = NOW()
WHERE id = $1::uuid
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM public.usuarios_quest uq
    WHERE uq.id = quests_recorrencias.usuarios_quest_id
      AND uq.usuario_id = $3::uuid
  )
  AND $4::text = 'quest'
RETURNING id, anotacoes_quest, atualizado_em;

SELECT id, anotacoes_usr as anotacao, atualizado_em
FROM public.usr_chat
WHERE id = $1::uuid
  AND usuario_id = $2::uuid
  AND $3::text = 'conversa'
LIMIT 1;

SELECT qr.id, qr.anotacoes_quest as anotacao, qr.atualizado_em
FROM public.quests_recorrencias qr
INNER JOIN public.usuarios_quest uq ON uq.id = qr.usuarios_quest_id
WHERE qr.id = $1::uuid
  AND uq.usuario_id = $2::uuid
  AND $3::text = 'quest'
LIMIT 1;
